mode: ContinuousDelivery
next-version: 0.1.0
tag-prefix: '[vV]'
continuous-delivery-fallback-tag: ci
assembly-versioning-scheme: MajorMinorPatch
assembly-file-versioning-scheme: MajorMinorPatch
commit-message-incrementing: Enabled
ignore:
  sha: []
# Safe default if a branch doesn't match anything below
increment: Patch
branches:
  # Production line. Only changes via PRs (merges) land here.
  master:
    regex: ^master$
    tag: ''                       # stable, no prerelease tag
    increment: Patch              # if something lands straight on master (e.g., hotfix PR), default bump is Patch
    tracks-release-branches: true
  # Integration line. Always targeting the next minor.
  develop:
    regex: ^develop$
    tag: alpha                    # prereleases of the next minor
    increment: Minor
    source-branches: [ master ]
  # Stabilization line. Can be cut from develop (next minor) or from master (patch-only release).
  release:
    regex: ^release[/-].*$
    tag: rc                       # release candidate builds
    is-release-branch: true
    increment: None               # freeze base version; only rc/build metadata increments
    source-branches: [ develop, master ]
  # Feature work. PRs from here typically go into develop.
  feature:
    regex: ^feature[/-].*$
    tag: alpha
    increment: Minor
    source-branches: [ develop, master ]
  # PR builds inherit the target branch version, but are marked as PR prereleases.
  pull-request:
    regex: ^(pull|pull\-request|pr)[/-].*$
    tag: pr
    increment: Inherit            # inherit bump rules from the target branch
    track-merge-target: true      # version is calculated from the PR target (develop/release/master)
    source-branches: [ master, develop, release, feature ]
